content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <?xml-stylesheet href="mmab.xsl" type="text/xsl" ?>  <person> <name> Bin Li</name> <title> Scientific Programmer </title> <extension>3671</extension> <email>bin.li@noaa.gov</email> <employer> NCEP/EMC/Marine Modeling and Analysis Branch</employer> <site>College Park, MD</site> <blurb> Ocean modeling with the HYCOM model and ocean wave modeling with the NOAA WAVEWATCH III model. </blurb> </person>
